title: Annual Leave Policy
details: Employees are entitled to 20 days of annual leave per year
Leave accrues monthly and unused leave carries over to next year (max 5 days)
Must notify manager at least 2 weeks in advance
Submit request through HR Portal for approval
Public holidays are in addition to annual leave
Final pay includes unused leave balance upon termination

title: Sick Leave Policy
details: 10 days of paid sick leave per year
Notify manager and HR within 2 hours of absence
Medical certificate required for absences exceeding 3 consecutive days
Unused sick leave does not carry over
Compassionate leave (3 days) available for family illness
Contact HR Help Desk for reporting absence

title: Parental Leave Policy
details: Maternity leave: 4 months paid leave after delivery
Paternity leave: 2 weeks paid leave
Job protected during approved leave period
Apply minimum 8 weeks in advance
Flexible return-to-work options available
Breastfeeding breaks provided for nursing mothers

title: Remote Work Policy
details: Employees may work from home up to 3 days per week
Manager approval required for remote work arrangement
Must maintain secure home workspace
Required attendance on team collaboration days
VPN access must be enabled for remote work
Report any security incidents immediately

title: Flexible Working Hours
details: Core hours are 10:00 AM to 3:00 PM daily
Flexible start times between 7:00 AM to 10:00 AM
Flexible end times between 3:00 PM to 6:00 PM
Total hours per week must be 40 hours
Submit flexible hours request to manager
Schedule must align with team collaboration needs

title: Dress Code Policy
details: Standard business attire required Monday to Thursday
Casual Friday: neat jeans and company polo/t-shirt acceptable
Client-facing roles must maintain professional appearance daily
No offensive graphics, torn clothing, or inappropriate attire
Safety equipment required in warehouse/facilities areas
Exceptions approved on case-by-case basis

title: Code of Conduct
details: Treat all colleagues with respect and dignity
Zero tolerance for harassment or discrimination
Maintain confidentiality of company information
Use company resources for business purposes only
Report unethical behavior through proper channels
Violations may result in disciplinary action up to termination

title: Data Security & Confidentiality
description: Protection of company and customer data
details: All employees must sign NDA upon hiring
Sensitive data must be encrypted and password-protected
Do not share passwords or access credentials
Report data breaches immediately to IT Security
Personal devices must have security software installed
Proper disposal of confidential documents required

title: Benefits Overview
details: Comprehensive health insurance (medical, dental, vision)
Life insurance (3x annual salary)
Pension plan with company matching (5%)
Professional development budget (£1,500 annually)
Gym membership subsidy (50%)
Employee discount program (10-25% on selected partners)

title: Expense Reimbursement Policy
details: Submit expenses within 30 days of incurrence
Original receipts required for all claims
Pre-approval needed for expenses over £500
Personal expenses not reimbursed
Hotel stays max £150 per night (excluding business travel)
Meal allowances: £30/day (UK), £40/day (International)
